summary: Successfully merged state persistence and Polymarket API integration features by combining both implementations. Preserved StateManager class from origin/main for state.py and updated README.md to document both feature sets.
strategyUsed: Combined both feature branches: kept StateManager class-based implementation from origin/main for state.py and tests, while merging documentation for both state persistence features and Polymarket API integration features in README.md. Both implementations provide complementary functionality and were successfully integrated.
